entities.name: duelling club
entities.description: The duelling club is mentioned as the location where the narrator is being taken.

entities.name: oak door
entities.description: A gleaming oak door with a brass knocker in the shape of a griffon is seen ahead.

entities.name: griffon
entities.description: The brass knocker on the oak door is in the shape of a griffon.

relationships.description: The duelling club is located where the oak door is seen ahead.
Dumbledore lived at the duelling club.
